summary: Here it is an Excellent Boss overhaul with EXTRAS!
descriptionHtml:
Here it is Finally I have finished episode 1 of Dangerous Skyrim

I did not add pics of the Boss\'s cause I want them to be suprise I dont mind you guys postin them though :P

What this mod does is add a bunch of kick-ass content (not for the casual player) 
This mod adds 7 big time bosses in skyrim and new mobs like dwarfs, Daedric Gods etc.
Also Each boss holds a very unique weopan, I also added special gear and created a new type of arrow called Flash Bolts (they are killer) and to help you through this hardcore mod I added 2 
really nice Followers to the getup they are both tough and lvl up with you all the way to lvl 90! 

I do ask however if you enjoy and use this mod ENDORSE ME I have worked hard on this and will 
be implementing more episodes as long as people show there support! hell I could use a new pc anyhow :D Enjoy this mod and please leave comments with suggestions.

You can also add my other boss mod The Puppet Master for an extra kick ass boss.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10419


Future Goals:
-Fix for the Exhiled Mages
-Merging Puppet Master Complete
-Adding Unique dungeons for each boss including Jaws
-Tweaking Followers maybe adding a few more
-Voice over + in-depth quests
-may merge my Skeletor mod in as him being a boss?!
>>> http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6771
author: Rodrick1981
